hanzi-su-wiki:
撤

Значения

Снимать, убирать, выводить; отменять

Мнемоника

Воспитывать 育 дитя. Отец — наказывает 攵, а мать своей рукой 扌 отменяет наказание.
purpleculture_pinyin:
chè
to remove; to take away; to withdraw
удалять; забрать; отозвать
rtega_mnemonic:
撤撤RSomit, remove, withdraw
  • hand 扌 preventing another hand going to 彳 destroy a jug 徹: remove or omit from destruction
purpleculture_examples:
撤销 [ chè xiāo ]: to repeal; to revoke; (computing) to undo
撤出 [ chè chū ]: to withdraw; to leave; to retreat; to pull out
撤军 [ chè jūn ]: to withdraw troops; to retreat
撤离 [ chè lí ]: to withdraw from; to evacuate
撤职 [ chè zhí ]: to eliminate; to sack; to remove from office

heisig_chinese_memo: A terrible taskmaster is bringing up his infant with a rough education. Every time the infant does something wrong he prefers to remove the bad behavior with a finger slap.
heisig_constituent: remove, finger, fingers, borstal, bring up, infant, toddler, top hat, elbow, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, taskmaster
Keyword_KANJIDIC: remove, withdraw, disarm, dismantle, reject, exclude
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: удалить, снять, снятия с охраны, разбирает, отклонить, исключить
koohiiStory1: Don´t lay a finger on him, a concerned mother says as the state REMOVES her child away for upbringing by a taskmaster foster home.
koohiiStory2: A terrible yakuza taskmaster is bringing up his infant. Every time the infant does something wrong... well, you know what happens to yakuzas when they do something wrong.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You use your fingers to dig through the trash in the light of the moon in winter because you're going through withdrawal. You need your fix and you need it now, so you're willing to freeze your fingers off digging through moonlit trash to get it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine withdrawal this bad, that you're in the trash like this. Close your eyes and feel the cold, smell the stink.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The withdrawal makes you withdraw a 鉄 (てつ) and try to eat it. The taste of the 鉄 fills your entire mouth.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: These withdrawals are turning you into an 鉄 eater. Ahhh!
Ru_Meaning: remove, withdraw, disarm, dismantle, reject, exclude
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 徹 (テツ пронизывать, проходить насквозь).

  • отмена, ликвидация

  • эвакуация, вывод (войск)

    • warodai
    撤収てっしゅう
  • снос здания, разбор палатки
  • отвод войск, отступление

Ru_trainchinese: chè: (глаг) убирать, снимать (с должности), эвакуировать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if the hand (扌) grows up (育) and strikes (攵) you withdraw
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A terrible taskmaster is bringing up his infant with a rough education. Every time the infant does something wrong he prefers to remove the bad behavior with a finger slap.
humanum_full_description_en:
from the " hand ", "to complete " the sound, the original meaning is to remove and eliminate. "The Analects of Confucius-Xiangdang": "Don't withdraw the ginger food." He Yan's collection of explanations quoted Kong Anguo's saying: "Withdraw, go."

" Withdraw " can mean dismantling. "Southern History-The Biography of Ruan Xiaoxu": "Xiaoxu knows that he does not eat, and even makes him leave the house and cook.

" Withdraw " also means withdraw, retreat. "Three Kingdoms·Wu Zhi·Lü Meng Biography": "After hearing this, the troops must be withdrawn."

" Withdraw " and "勶" are of the same character with different forms , "Shuowen": " Faye. Congrui from strength and thoroughness."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand ", " Toru " provincial sound, the original meaning is removed and eliminated.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「徹」省聲，本義為除去、消除。《論語‧鄉黨》：「不撤薑食。」何晏集解引孔安國曰：「撤，去也。」

　　「撤」可表示拆除。《南史‧阮孝緒傳》：「孝緒知之，乃不食，更令撤屋而炊。」

　　「撤」也表示撤回、撤退。《三國志‧吳志‧呂蒙傳》：「羽聞之，必撤備兵。」

　　「撤」與「勶」屬同字異體，《說文》：「發也。从力从徹，徹亦聲。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「徹」省聲，本義為除去、消除。

from the " hand", "to complete" the sound, the original meaning is to remove and eliminate. "The Analects of Confucius-Xiangdang": "Don't withdraw the ginger food." He Yan's collection of explanations quoted Kong Anguo's saying: "Withdraw, go." " Withdraw" can mean dismantling. "Southern History-The Biography of Ruan Xiaoxu": "Xiaoxu knows that he does not eat, and even makes him leave the house and cook. " Withdraw" also means withdraw, retreat. "Three Kingdoms·Wu Zhi·Lü Meng Biography": "After hearing this, the troops must be withdrawn." " Withdraw" and " 勶" are of the same character with different forms, "Shuowen": " Faye. Congrui from strength and thoroughness."

Liushutong characters (3)

撤字的基本解释

撤
chè
免除，除去：撤职。撤销。撤任。
退，收回：撤退。撤防。撤岗。撤回。撤诉。撤换。撤离。
减轻，减退：撤味儿。撤分量。撤火。

撤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chè］
［《廣韻》丑列切，入薛，徹。］
［《廣韻》直列切，入薛，澄。］
(1)除去；消除。
(2)撤回；撤退。
(3)指回转。参见“撤身”。
(4)拆除。
(5)免除。
(6)减轻气味、分量等。
(7)放松。参见“撤嘴”。
(8)取，讨取。
(9)挖剥。
(10)用同“徹”。参见“撤曉”。

撤字的英文翻译

◎ 撤
remove, take away, withdraw

撤字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撤； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页455第10
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?直列切，音轍。發也。　又除去也。【論語】不撤薑食。【唐書·高宗紀】以旱避正殿，減膳撤樂。　又【唐韻】丑列切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】敕列切，?音徹。讀與掣近。亦發也。又抽也，剝也。　育本从?，字書从?，故入十二畫。?，倒子，字作丄下厶。

撤字的源字形

撤字的起名意思

意指除去，解雇，免职，解除，退，收回。

Basic explanation of words
withdraw
chè
Exempt, remove: dismissal. Revoke. Resignation.
Retreat, retract: retreat. Disarm. Dismissal. withdraw. Withdraw the lawsuit. replace. Evacuate.
Reduce, diminish: withdraw the taste. Withdraw the amount. Withdraw the fire.
withdraw
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chè］
["Guangyun" ugly column cut, into Xue, tore. ]
["Guangyun" cut in line, enter Xue, Cheng. ]
(1) Remove; eliminate.
(2) Withdraw; withdraw.
(3) Refers to rotation. See "Withdrawal".
(4) Demolition.
(5) Exemption.
(6) Reduce odor, weight, etc.
(7) Relax. See "Withdrawal".
(8) Take, ask for.
(9) Digging and stripping.
(10) Use the same "toru". See "Withdrawal".

Source glyph
withdraw
Name meaning
It means removal, dismissal, dismissal, dismissal, resignation, withdrawal.
撤
会意字。篆书从力,表示用力除去;从徹,徹有除去义;徹(che)兼表声。隶、楷书从主(手),从散(去掉),敵(che )兼
表声。本义是除去。
①除去:~职」~除」~消。②退;撤退:~兵|~离。
chè
~回 ~火 ~军 ~空
~保~差 ~防 ~换
~任 ~诉 ~~退 ~席 ~销 ~走 裁~ 后~
彎|撤|撤
隶
楷
отзывать
Зная слово.
Сценарий печати основан на силе, что означает удаление с силой; от разрыва - для удаления праведности; tore (che) также выражает звук.
Ли и обычные скрипты идут от мастера (руки), от разброса (убрать), а противник (че) тоже выражает звук.
Первоначальное значение - удалить.
①Удаление: ~ Job "~ Except" ~ устранение.
②Отступление; отступление: ~ солдаты | ~ уходят.
~ Назад ~ Огонь ~ Армия ~ Пусто ~ Защита ~ Плохая ~ Защита ~ Замена ~ Рен ~ Сью ~~ Уйти в отставку ~ Сиденье ~ Продано ~ Скорректировано ~ Назад ~ Изгиб | Отвод | Вывод
писец
Кай
chè
гл.
1) убирать, удалять, устранять; отбрасывать
把障碍物撤了 убрать препятствие
2) снимать (с должности); лишать (полномочий)
撤委 снимать с должности, лишать полномочий
3) отвергать; отменять, убирать, ликвидировать
厨房撤了 кухню закрыли (убрали отсюда)
撤案子 закрыть (судебное/следственное) дело
4) отводить назад; отзывать; эвакуировать
向后撤 отвести (отступить) назад
5) ослаблять; сдабривать
撤味儿 сдобрить вкус; приправить
撤撤咸 ослабить (отбить) солёный вкус
Radicals: 扌, 月, 夂  (fingers, moon, winter, trash)
Meaning Mnemonic
You use your fingers to dig through the trash in the light of the moon in winter because you're going through withdrawal. You need your fix and you need it now, so you're willing to freeze your fingers off digging through moonlit trash to get it.
Imagine withdrawal this bad, that you're in the trash like this. Close your eyes and feel the cold, smell the stink.
Reading Mnemonic
The withdrawal makes you withdraw a 鉄 (てつ) and try to eat it. The taste of the 鉄 fills your entire mouth.
These withdrawals are turning you into an 鉄 eater. Ahhh!
